Description: Painted limestone shabti of Wʿb P3-mʿrw with a white lappet-wig, a red modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two incised red hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over one shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs inlaid with black and separated with red incised lines.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
